title: 90th Anniversary of the Social Security Act
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation marking the 90th anniversary of the Social Security Act. President Donald J. Trump highlights the Act's significance in protecting seniors, supporting citizens, and sustaining livelihoods. Key initiatives include the One Big Beautiful Bill, which eliminates taxes on Social Security benefits for most seniors, and measures to combat fraud and abuse within the system. The proclamation also emphasizes strengthening border security to preserve Social Security and Medicare for legal citizens. The President reaffirms the commitment to protecting and strengthening Social Security and Medicare, ensuring future generations receive the benefits they deserve.
